sentences: Anthony Davis (born September 6, 1970), better known by his stage name Ant, is an American hip hop producer.

He is best known as being one half of the hip hop group Atmosphere, but has worked with many other artists and projects, mostly with Rhymesayers Entertainment, such as Brother Ali, I Self Devine, Felt and The Dynospectrum.
He has also released two solo albums, Melodies and Memories, and Melodies and Memories 85–89.
Ant started to become interested in DJing at a very young age.
He would watch his father DJ in the army while he would picture himself as Grandmaster Flash.
Years later he would start to use producing and DJing as much more than a hobby.
The first CD that he worked on was Comparison by Beyond, later known by Sab the Artist, in 1996.
While producing that album, he met Sean Daley (Slug) and they later worked together.
With one exception (Lucy Ford: The Atmosphere EPs), Ant has produced every Atmosphere album in full.
He also works with various artists that are a part of Rhymesayers Entertainment (including full production of three Brother Ali albums) and many more.
Melodies and Memories 85–89 (2005)with Atmosphere (for more information, see Atmosphere Discography)
You Can't Imagine How Much Fun We're Having (2005)
Ant produces the track "Love is a Pimp"
When Life Gives You Lemons, You Paint That Shit Gold (2008)
To All My Friends, Blood Makes The Blade Holy: The Atmosphere EP's (2010)
All The Beauty In This Whole Life (Rhymesayers Entertainment, 2017)with Felt
Felt, Vol. 2: A Tribute to Lisa Bonet (Rhymesayers Entertainment, 2005)
Ant produces all tracks except "Open Your Eyes"
Kanser – Inner City Outer Space (Interlock Records, 2000) Ant produces the track "Girls Step To This"
Deep Puddle Dynamics – The Taste Of Rain...
Ant produces the track "The Scarecrow Speaks"
Ant produces the tracks "Posin'", "Cut Throat", "Extravagant", "In My World", "Powerite", "Make Believe", "Fools Paradise", and "Falling Apart"
Murs – The End Of The Beginning... (definitive jux, 2002)
Ant produces the tracks "18/w A Bullet (Remix)" & "Got Damned"
The Planets – The Opening (Red Sea Records, 2002)
Sage Francis – Human the Death Dance (Epitaph Records, 2007)
I Self Devine – Self Destruction (Rhymesayers Entertainment, 2005)
Ant produces the tracks "Getcha Money On", "All I Know", "Sex Sex Sex", "Feel My Pain", "I Can't Say Nothing Wrong", "Overthrow" and "Sunshine".
